description.value: Code system of concepts specifying whether or not the patient has a living will and, if so, whether a copy fo the living will is on file at the healthcare facility. If the patient does not have a living will, the value of this field indicates whether the patient was provided information on living wills. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the Patient Visit - Additional Information ( PV2) and Patient Additional Demographic (PD1) segments.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0315 (Living Will Code)
